Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's First Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and his first adventure, starting with a taxi ride and leading to an underwater investigation of a suspicious yacht and a Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Taxi Ride and Transformation
sub_scenes.description: Duke, as a taxi driver, picks up suspicious passengers and notices he is being followed. This leads to his transformation into the Human Meteor.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Following

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Confrontation and Hospitalization
sub_scenes.description: The Human Meteor confronts the suspicious sedan, leading to a fight and his subsequent hospitalization, where he learns about a yacht and Holder.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Yacht Stowaway Plan and Hidden Observer
sub_scenes.description: Duke, back in civilian clothes, plans to stow away on the yacht. Simultaneously, a hidden observer is revealed, adding intrigue.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Stowaway Plan and Radio Message

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Pete's Ejection
sub_scenes.description: Pete, on the yacht, investigates a cabin and discovers a depth chart, leading to his discovery and violent ejection into the water.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Duties and Cabin Investigation

sub_scenes.title: Pete's Rescue and Underwater Mission
sub_scenes.description: Pete is rescued by a submarine captain and revealed to be Toby. He is then briefed for an underwater mission.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Underwater Discovery and Torpedo Operation
sub_scenes.description: Toby discovers a sunken Japanese submarine and witnesses enemy divers loading torpedoes, uncovering a sinister operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Sunken Submarine and Enemy Diver

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Fight and Tentacle Intervention
sub_scenes.description: An underwater fight erupts as Toby is attacked by enemy divers. Tentacles suddenly intervene, disrupting the fight and introducing a new threat.

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Arrival and Revelation of Peter's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Namor arrives, attacks the submarine with a torpedo, and then surfaces on the yacht. He discovers Peter's death and uncovers Peter's treachery with a depth map.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor Surfaces and Learns of Peter's Death
Discovery of Depth Map and Peter's Treachery Revealed

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Departure and Hospital Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Namor and Toby urgently depart and then visit a hospital, where they discuss their recovery and Holden's condition, concluding their immediate adventure.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Liberty Lads and their involvement in uncovering and fighting against a Nazi spy ring, leading to a confrontation at a garage and a marine barracks.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads in Combat and Ambulance Observation
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads are engaged in combat with Nazi agents. Two boys, Skip and Chuck, observe an ambulance arriving at a house, witnessing an injured man being taken away.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Combat Against Enemies
Ambulance Arrival and Discovery of Injured Man

sub_scenes.title: The Dropped Wallet and Marine Salute
sub_scenes.description: The boys find a dropped wallet near the ambulance, leading them to a garage where they witness a marine saluting a civilian, Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Garage Address
The Marine Salute and Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Garage Encounter and Mr. Horst's Threat
sub_scenes.description: At the garage, the boys encounter a police officer who leads them inside, where they are abruptly confronted and threatened by Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Police Officer at the Garage
Inside the Garage and the Order to Wait
The Abrupt Arrival of Mr. Horst

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Carbon Monoxide Plot, and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys about the wallet while Major Bronson plots a sinister carbon monoxide solution. Horst then betrays Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Sabotage Plans, and Barracks Attack
sub_scenes.description: The boys escape and discover sabotage plans, leading to an attack on the Marine Barracks.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Defense, Confrontation, and Marine Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Skip defends himself during the barracks attack while Major Bronson arrives, leading to a marine confrontation and the Major's injury.

sub_scenes.title: Final Confrontation and Victory
sub_scenes.description: The Marines engage in a final confrontation with the attackers, securing victory and providing medical aid to the injured Major, ultimately dismantling the Nazi spy ring.

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South America
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Champ and Henry in South America, where they are ambushed, seek refuge in a town, and get entangled in a kidnapping case involving President Rosita's daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Desert Ambush and Arrival in Town
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are ambushed in a desert landscape but manage to reach a South American town, seeking refuge in a hotel.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in a South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Soldiers Find and Interrogate the Americans
sub_scenes.description: Soldiers locate Champ and Henry in the town and confront them, initiating a tense interrogation about President Rosita's daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback and Escape Plan
sub_scenes.description: A flashback shows a previous confusing encounter with officers. Champ decides to escape and seek help from the American Consul.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and Plan to Seek Consul

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation Continues and Rosita's Kidnapping Explained
sub_scenes.description: Despite the escape attempt, the interrogation continues, and an officer explains the reason for their suspicion: Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Explanation: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre's Threat

sub_scenes.title: Abduction and Mistaken Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are abducted by a bald man but are then mistaken for rescuers by Rosita's mother, Mama.

sub_scenes.title: Planning the Tamale Street Operation and El Tigre Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: A plan is formed to locate El Tigre at Tamale Street. They infiltrate his hideout using a dollar diversion and finally confront El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and Sock Attack

sub_scenes.title: Side Conflicts and Rosita's Rescue Plan
sub_scenes.description: Amidst side conflicts, a plan is formed to interrogate El Tigre about Rosita's location, leading to a rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
El Tigre's Concern about Name Misuse

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Rescue and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: The rescue mission begins with a pursuit, infiltration, and finally, Rosita is rescued amidst ongoing combat, leading to a moment of gratitude and recognition.

narrative_arcs.title: Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Plan
Machine Gun Threat and Maid's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, where he faces betrayal, capture, torture, and ultimately turns the tables on his captors and gains unexpected allies.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Captain's Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan is introduced in jungle combat, while Captain Lawton faces a dilemma regarding his disobedient son held hostage.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan infiltrates the jungle, tracking someone, but is ominously observed and ambushed by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Submission
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured, brought before Grauer, and subjected to torture to extract plans, leading to his forced submission.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Arson, and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan escapes amidst a fire, seemingly intentionally set in native huts by his captors. He later reveals he was not defeated and gains an alliance with the natives.

narrative_arcs.title: Office Confrontation, Chase, and Fire Start
Grauer's Plan and Native Huts Fire
Intentional Arson and Dolan in Flames

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma, Bar Brawl, and Dolan's Lesson
sub_scenes.description: Captain Lawton faces a dilemma and unexpectedly encounters Dolan. A bar brawl ensues, followed by a resolution where Dolan is reprimanded but ultimately praised and learns a lesson about service.

narrative_arcs.title: Barroom Brawl - Taste of American Lead
Order Rescinded, Shore Leave, and Dolan's Deed

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Reilly Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, as they investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them to uncover a racketeering plot and help save a sick girl.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins and Newspaper Briefing
sub_scenes.description: The Twinkle Twins are introduced, and they receive a briefing at the Weston Call newspaper office about the Robert Burgess murder and Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on the Reilly Case

sub_scenes.title: Police Headquarters and Hospital Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane go to police headquarters and then to a hospital, following leads related to Tom Reilly and his sick child.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Miss Reilly's Illness and Farnacci Connection
sub_scenes.description: The Twins encounter the sick Miss Reilly and learn about her need for a rare blood type, connecting the case to racketeer Farnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Sick Miss Reilly
Miss Reilly's Medical Needs and Farnacci's Blood

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Revelation and Newspaper Confirmation
sub_scenes.description: Diane recognizes Farnacci's name, linking him to racketeering. They contact Elijah, and newspaper confirms Farnacci's gang's involvement and the banker's threat against them.

sub_scenes.title: Search in Irish Section and Meeting Mrs. Murphy
sub_scenes.description: The Twins decide to search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section, leading them to Mrs. Murphy and a confession about Farnacci taking the blame.

narrative_arcs.title: Heading to the Irish Section for Tom Reilly
Continuing the Search and Hearing Whispers
Meeting Mrs. Murphy and the Confession

sub_scenes.title: Murphy's Fear, Taxi Ambush, and Dan's Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Murphy expresses fear of Farnacci's mob. A taxi arrives, leading to a violent ambush. Dan pursues the shooters.

narrative_arcs.title: Farnacci's Mob Threat and Mr. Murphy's Fate

sub_scenes.title: Chase Tactics, Diane's Taxi, and Community Uprising
sub_scenes.description: Dan chases the shooters with daring tactics, while Diane pursues in a taxi. The community rises up, and the shooters remain menacing.

sub_scenes.title: Police Capture, Hospital Emergency, and Community Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: Police apprehend the shooters. The injured are rushed to the hospital, where the community responds to a blood appeal for Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion Need
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest Plan and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: A plan is made to arrest Farnacci. The story concludes with a birthday celebration for Lassie Reilly, marking a happy resolution to the case.
